title: James A. McDivitt, Commander in Early NASA Triumphs, Is Dead at 93
description: In the 1960s, he led the first spacewalk mission and took part in the first crewed orbital flight of a lunar module.
dc:creator: Richard Goldstein
media:description: James A. McDivitt, right, and Edward H. White 2d inside their Gemini 4 spacecraft awaiting liftoff in June 1965. The highlight of the four-day mission was a pioneering spacewalk.
